import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../components/Assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../components/Assets/cart_icon.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ShopContext } from '../context/ShopContext' const Navbar = () => { const [menu,setMenu]=useState("shop") const [getTotalcartItems]=useContext(ShopContext) return (

SHOPPER

  • {setMenu("shop")}}>Shop {menu==="shop"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("mens")}}>Men {menu==="mens"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("womens")}}>Women{menu==="womens"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("kids")}}>Kids{menu==="kids"?
    :<>}
0
) } export default Navbar
